# KYC Onboarding Specification

> Complete technical specification for individual customer KYC onboarding in an Indian stock broking firm.

## Author

- Name: Rakesh Waghela
- Role: Tech & KYC Solutions Architect
- LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/rakeshwaghela
- X (Twitter): https://x.com/webiyo
- Consultation: https://topmate.io/rakeshwaghela

## About This Site

This documentation covers a 9-screen mobile-first KYC (Know Your Customer) user journey, 25+ vendor integrations, 8 parallel batch pipelines, maker-checker admin workflow, and full SEBI/KRA/CKYC regulatory compliance for an Indian stock broking firm. The system enables individual customers to go from mobile OTP to first trade in 24-72 hours.

## Sections

### Architecture
Design principles, flow summary, data source mapping, security & compliance.
- https://javajack.github.io/broking-kyc/architecture/design-principles/
- https://javajack.github.io/broking-kyc/architecture/flow-summary/
- https://javajack.github.io/broking-kyc/architecture/data-source-mapping/
- https://javajack.github.io/broking-kyc/architecture/security-compliance/

Detailed specification for each of the 9 onboarding screens.
- https://javajack.github.io/broking-kyc/journey/

- https://javajack.github.io/broking-kyc/journey/02-pan-dob/

- https://javajack.github.io/broking-kyc/journey/04-confirm-identity/
- https://javajack.github.io/broking-kyc/journey/05-bank-account/
- https://javajack.github.io/broking-kyc/journey/06-trading-preferences/
- https://javajack.github.io/broking-kyc/journey/07-nominations/
- https://javajack.github.io/broking-kyc/journey/08-declarations-gate/
- https://javajack.github.io/broking-kyc/journey/09-review-esign/

## Key Regulatory References

- SEBI KYC Master Circular: SEBI/HO/MIRSD/MIRSD-SEC-2/P/CIR/2023/168 (Oct 2023)
- SEBI Stock Brokers Master Circular: SEBI/HO/MIRSD/MIRSD-PoD/P/CIR/2025/90 (Jun 2025)
- SEBI Stock Brokers Regulations 2026: Notified Jan 7, 2026
- Dual KRA + CKYC Upload: Mandatory since Aug 2024
- DDPI (replaces POA): Since Nov 2022, optional
- Up to 10 Nominees: Since Jan 2025, opt-out needs video verification
- FATCA/CRS upload to KRA: Mandatory since Jul 2024
